title: Plan and Layer Your Survival Kit
brief: Organize survival equipment in layers based on importance and carrying capacity.
steps: Step 1: Keep the most critical items (map, compass) on your body at all times.
Step 2: Place moderately important items on your load-bearing equipment or vest.
Step 3: Store bulky, less critical items in your rucksack or vehicle.
Step 4: Select multi-purpose items whenever possible to reduce weight and space.
Step 5: Avoid duplicating items that serve the same single function.
Step 6: Choose a container that is waterproof, durable, easily carried, and fits various sized components.
warnings: Putting critical items only in a pack you might lose could leave you without essential tools.
Overloading yourself with duplicate items reduces mobility and energy.
